NK041(di)042:1: // 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po bzhugs so //
NK041(di)042:3: ar+ya b+ha dra ts+aar+ya pra ni d+ha na r+aa dz+aa /
NK041(di)042:5: 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po /
NK041(di)042:6: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)042:7: ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na //
NK041(di)042:8: dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge kun //
NK041(di)042:9: bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la //
NK041(di)042:10: lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bagyi'o //
NK041(di)042:11: bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis //
NK041(di)042:12: rgyal ba thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du //
NK041(di)042:13: zhing gi rdul snyed lus rab btud pa yis //
NK041(di)042:14: rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)042:15: rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams //
NK041(di)042:16: sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag /
NK041(di)042:17: de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa //
NK041(di)042:18: thams cad rgyal ba dag gis gang bar mos //
NK041(di)042:19: de dag basngagasa pa mi zad rgya mtsho rnams //
NK041(di)042:20: dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra kun gyis //
NK041(di)042:21: rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab brjod cing //
NK041(di)042:22: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod //
NK041(di)042:23: me tog dam pa phreng ba dam pa dang //
NK041(di)042:24: sil snyan rnams dang byug pa gdugs mchog dang //
NK041(di)042:25: mar me mchog dang bdug spos dam pa yis //
NK041(di)042:26: rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi //
NK041(di)042:27: na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang //
NK041(di)042:28: phye ma phur ma ri rab mnyam pa dang //
NK041(di)042:29: bkod pa khyad par 'phags pa'i mchog kun gyis //
NK041(di)042:30: rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi //
NK041(di)042:31: mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba //
NK041(di)042:32: de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos //
NK041(di)042:33: bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag gis //
NK041(di)042:34: rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi //
NK041(di)042:35: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis ni //
NK041(di)042:36: lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang //
NK041(di)042:37: sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa //
NK041(di)042:38: de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags //
NK041(di)042:39: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras //
NK041(di)042:40: rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang //
NK041(di)042:41: 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gang la yang //
NK041(di)042:42: de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang //
NK041(di)042:43: gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma rnams //
NK041(di)042:44: byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes //
NK041(di)042:45: mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la //
NK041(di)042:46: 'khor lo bla na med par bskor bar bskul //
NK041(di)042:47: mya ngan 'da' ston gang bzhed de dag la //
NK041(di)042:48: 'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir //
NK041(di)042:49: bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang //
NK041(di)042:50: bdag gis thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi //
NK041(di)042:51: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang //
NK041(di)042:52: rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi //
NK041(di)042:53: dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa //
NK041(di)042:54: thams cad bdag gi byang chub phyir bsngo'o //
NK041(di)042:55: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yi //
NK041(di)042:56: 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur //
NK041(di)042:57: gang yang ma byon de dag rab myur bar //
NK041(di)042:58: bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas spyon //
NK041(di)042:59: phyogs bcu'i ga la'i zhing rnams ji snyed pa //
NK041(di)042:60: de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur //
NK041(di)042:61: byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang //
NK041(di)042:62: sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog /
NK041(di)042:63: phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa //
NK041(di)042:64: de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur //
NK041(di)042:65: 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni //
NK041(di)042:66: mthun par gyur cing re ba'ang 'grub par shog /
NK041(di)042:67: byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing //
NK041(di)042:68: 'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par gyur //
NK041(di)042:69: tshe rabs kun tu 'chi 'pho skye ba na //
NK041(di)042:70: rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog /
NK041(di)042:71: rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te //
NK041(di)042:72: bzang po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing //
NK041(di)042:73: tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yang dag pa //
NK041(di)042:74: rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog /
NK041(di)042:75: lha yi skad dang glu dang gnod sbyin skad //
NK041(di)042:76: grul bum dag dang mi yi skad rnams dang //
NK041(di)042:77: 'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams ji tsam par //
NK041(di)042:78: thams cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to //
NK041(di)042:79: des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson te //
NK041(di)042:80: byang chub sems ni nam yang brjed ma gyur //
NK041(di)042:81: sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par gyur pa dag /
NK041(di)042:82: de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog /
NK041(di)042:83: las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las //
NK041(di)042:84: grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang //
NK041(di)042:85: ji ltar pad+mo chu mi chags pa bzhin //
NK041(di)042:86: nyi zla nam mkhar thogs pa med ltar spyod //
NK041(di)042:87: zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par //
NK041(di)042:88: ngan song sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed //
NK041(di)042:89: bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun 'god cing //
NK041(di)042:90: 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par spyad //
NK041(di)042:91: byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing //
NK041(di)042:92: sems can dag gi spyod dang mthun par 'jug /
NK041(di)042:93: bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing //
NK041(di)042:94: ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par 'gyur //
NK041(di)042:95: bdag gi spyod dang mtshungs par gang spyod pa //
NK041(di)042:96: de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog /
NK041(di)042:97: lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang //
NK041(di)042:98: spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad //
NK041(di)042:99: bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po dag /
NK041(di)042:100: bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams //
NK041(di)042:101: de dag dang yang rtag tu 'phrad par shog /
NK041(di)042:102: de dag bdag gis nam yang yid mi dbyung //
NK041(di)042:103: sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams //
NK041(di)042:104: mngon sum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal ba blta //
NK041(di)042:105: ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar //
NK041(di)042:106: de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi //
NK041(di)042:107: rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing //
NK041(di)042:108: byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed //
NK041(di)042:109: bzang po spyod pa rnam par sbyong ba yang //
NK041(di)042:110: ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi //
NK041(di)042:111: srid pa thams cad du yang 'khor ba na //
NK041(di)042:112: bsod nams ye shes dag ni mi zad brnyes //
NK041(di)042:113: thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang //
NK041(di)042:114: yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur //
NK041(di)042:115: rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams te //
NK041(di)042:116: zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams //
NK041(di)042:117: sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la //
NK041(di)042:118: byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi //
NK041(di)042:119: de ltar ma lus thams cad phyogs su yang //
NK041(di)042:120: skra tsam khyon la dus gsum tshad snyed kyi //
NK041(di)042:121: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang //
NK041(di)042:122: bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug /
NK041(di)042:123: gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis //
NK041(di)042:124: rgyal ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa //
NK041(di)042:125: 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs //
NK041(di)042:126: sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi //
NK041(di)042:127: dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad dag /
NK041(di)042:128: 'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi //
NK041(di)042:129: de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi zad la //
NK041(di)042:130: blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug /
NK041(di)042:131: ma 'ongs bskal pa thams cad 'jug par yang //
NK041(di)042:132: skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi //
NK041(di)042:133: gang yang bskal pa dus gsum tshad de dag /
NK041(di)042:134: skad cig cha shas kyis ni zhugs par spyad //
NK041(di)042:135: dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge gang //
NK041(di)042:136: de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta //
NK041(di)042:137: rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la //
NK041(di)042:138: sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug /
NK041(di)042:139: gang yang dus gsum dag gi zhing bkod pa //
NK041(di)042:140: de dag rdul gcig steng du mngon par bsgrub //
NK041(di)042:141: de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du //
NK041(di)042:142: rgyal ba dag gi zhing rnams bkod la 'jug /
NK041(di)042:143: gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams //
NK041(di)042:144: byang chub rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo bskor //
NK041(di)042:145: mya ngan 'das pa rab tu zhi mtha' ston //
NK041(di)042:146: mgon po kun gyi drung du bdag mchi'o //
NK041(di)042:147: kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang //
NK041(di)042:148: kun nas sgo yi theg pa'i stobs dag dang //
NK041(di)042:149: kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang //
NK041(di)042:150: kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs //
NK041(di)042:151: kun nas dge ba'i bsod nams stobs dag dang //
NK041(di)042:152: chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs //
NK041(di)042:153: shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis //
NK041(di)042:154: byang chub stobs rnams yang dag sgrub par byed //
NK041(di)042:155: las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing //
NK041(di)042:156: nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms par byed //
NK041(di)042:157: bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing //
NK041(di)042:158: bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi //
NK041(di)042:159: zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing //
NK041(di)042:160: sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par grol //
NK041(di)042:161: chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing //
NK041(di)042:162: ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed //
NK041(di)042:163: spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing //
NK041(di)042:164: smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed //
NK041(di)042:165: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cing //
NK041(di)042:166: bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skyo spyad par bgyi //
NK041(di)042:167: gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba yi //
NK041(di)042:168: byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams //
NK041(di)042:169: bzang po spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas //
NK041(di)042:170: de kun ma lus bdag gis rdzogs par bgyi //
NK041(di)042:171: rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo pa //
NK041(di)042:172: gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya //
NK041(di)042:173: mkhas pa de dang mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)042:174: dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo //
NK041(di)042:175: lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing //
NK041(di)042:176: spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag pa //
NK041(di)042:177: bsngo ba bzang po mkhas bci 'dra ba //
NK041(di)042:178: de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par shog /
NK041(di)042:179: kun nas dge ba bzang po spyod pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)042:180: 'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyad par bgyi //
NK041(di)042:181: ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar //
NK041(di)042:182: de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi //
NK041(di)042:183: spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig /
NK041(di)042:184: yon tan rnams kyang tshad bzung med par shog /
NK041(di)042:185: spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang //
NK041(di)042:186: de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi //
NK041(di)042:187: nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam par //
NK041(di)042:188: sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te //
NK041(di)042:189: ji tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa //
NK041(di)042:190: bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsam mo //
NK041(di)042:191: gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa //
NK041(di)042:192: rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la 'bul //
NK041(di)042:193: lha dang mi yi bde ba'i mchog rnams kyang //
NK041(di)042:194: zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul ba bas //
NK041(di)042:195: gang gis bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas //
NK041(di)042:196: byang chub mchog gi rjes su rab mos shing //
NK041(di)042:197: lan cig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pa na //
NK041(di)042:198: bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro //
NK041(di)042:199: gang gis bzang spyod smon lam 'di btab pas //
NK041(di)042:200: des ni ngan song thams cad spang bar 'gyur //
NK041(di)042:201: des ni grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin //
NK041(di)042:202: snang ba mtha' yas de yang des myur mthong //
NK041(di)042:203: de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed bde bar 'tsho //
NK041(di)042:204: mi tshe 'dir yang de dag legs par 'ong //
NK041(di)042:205: kun tu bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar //
NK041(di)042:206: de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur //
NK041(di)042:207: mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams //
NK041(di)042:208: gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag /
NK041(di)042:209: de yis bzang po spyod pa 'di brjod na //
NK041(di)042:210: myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur //
NK041(di)042:211: ye shes ngang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang //
NK041(di)042:212: rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur //
NK041(di)042:213: bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de mi thub //
NK041(di)042:214: 'jig rten gsum po kun na'ang mchod par 'gyur //
NK041(di)042:215: byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro //
NK041(di)042:216: song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug ste //
NK041(di)042:217: byang chub 'tshang rgya 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
NK041(di)042:218: bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad btul //
NK041(di)042:219: gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di //
NK041(di)042:220: 'chang ba dang ni ston tam klog na yang //
NK041(di)042:221: de yi rnam par smin pa'ang sangs rgyas mkhyen //
NK041(di)042:222: byang chub mchog la som nyi ma byed cig /
NK041(di)042:223: 'jam dpal dpa' bos ji ltar mkhyen pa dang //
NK041(di)042:224: kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te //
NK041(di)042:225: de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag slob phyir //
NK041(di)042:226: dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo //
NK041(di)042:227: dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba thams cad kyis //
NK041(di)042:228: bsngo ba gang la mchog tu basngagasa pa des //
NK041(di)042:229: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun kyang //
NK041(di)042:230: bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi //
NK041(di)042:231: bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na //
NK041(di)042:232: sgrib pa thams cad dag ni phyir bsal te //
NK041(di)042:233: mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas //
NK041(di)042:234: bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro //
NK041(di)042:235: der song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang //
NK041(di)042:236: thams cad ma lus mngon du 'gyur bar shog /
NK041(di)042:237: de ltar ma lus bdag gis yongs su bkang //
NK041(di)042:238: 'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi //
NK041(di)042:239: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der //
NK041(di)042:240: pad+mo dam pa shin tu mdzes las skyes //
NK041(di)042:241: snang ba mtha' yas rgyal bas mngon sum du //
NK041(di)042:242: lung bstan pa yang dag gi der thob shog /
NK041(di)042:243: der ni bdag gi lung bstan rab thob nas //
NK041(di)042:244: sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis //
NK041(di)042:245: blo yi stobs kyis phyogs bcu rnams su yang //
NK041(di)042:246: sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi //
NK041(di)042:247: bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam bton pa yi //
NK041(di)042:248: dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa //
NK041(di)042:249: des ni 'gro ba'i smon lam dge ba rnams //
NK041(di)042:250: skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'byor bar shog /
NK041(di)042:251: gang yang bzang po spyod pa 'di bsngosa pas //
NK041(di)042:252: bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa gang thob des //
NK041(di)042:253: 'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams //
NK041(di)042:254: 'od dpag med pa'i gnas rab thob par shog /
NK041(di)042:255: smon lam rgyal po 'di dag mchog gi gtso //
NK041(di)042:256: mtha' yas 'gro ba kun la phan byed cing //
NK041(di)042:257: kun tu bzang pos brgyan pa'i gzhung grub ste //
NK041(di)042:258: ngan song gnas rnams ma lus stongs par shog /
NK041(di)042:259: 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po rdzogs so ////
NK041(di)042:260: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
NK041(di)042:262: lo ts+aa ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas
NK041(di)042:263: bsgyur cing lo chen bee ro tsa nas zhus chen
